Key Match Events: Draymond Green's foul against Zach Edey upgraded to a Flagrant 1 after league review.
Post-Match Reflections: Draymond Green was ejected with 1:14 left in the game after picking up his second technical foul.
Golden State coach Steve Kerr got heated with officials at the end of the game.
